name: TextOCR

notes: Visit https://www.shaip.com/blog/15-best-opensource-handwriting-dataset/ and follow the provider instructions.

preprocess: Use word-level bounding boxes for detection
Train robust OCR for arbitrary shapes
limitations: License needs verification from canonical source
Domain may not match document OCR
justification: Dataset for arbitrary shaped scene-text, useful for training robust printed text OCR (T2) and general text recognition (T3).
